comments.raw_text:
When entering a date into an e-mail people will often include the day of the week. Unfortunately, frequently the day of the week and date do not match. In these cases we should catch this and flag it to the user to avoid the confusion (like we do with spelling checking). 

For example take the following question,

"Do you want to meet on Tues. Dec. 21, 2011?"

In this case Dec. 21 is a Wed. Did the user mean Tues. Dec. 20, 2011, or Wed. Dec. 21, 2011?

See the following reference for an invention disclosure that I have filed for this type of validation:
http://ip.com/IPCOM/000190393
